title: Google Assistant Developer Day
subtitle: Tool of N.A., 2020
description: Stage design and previsualization for a developer-focused virtual conference keynote stage. The stage was created in Unreal Engine and rendered out for the keynote speakers and their presentations to be composited into.

awards.project: 2021 VOICE Talks Presented by Google Assistant

title: Google I/O
subtitle: Sparks, 2019
description: At this yearly developers' conference, 'sandboxes' are hands-on product and technology demo exhibits, each within either a geodesic dome, tent, or inflatable structure. In 2019, there were eight Sandbox structures, each developed in close partnership between Google product teams and the design team at Sparks. I led the visual and structral design of Sandboxes specific to Android, Web Technologies, Android Auto, and Experiments.

awards.category: Best of the Decade: Best Conference, More Than 5,000 Attendees

title: Ally Digital Dollar AR
subtitle: Tool of N.A., 2021
description: This limited-time AR game turned regular, everyday dollar bills into valuable prizes. Scanning the front of the bill with the camera on an AR-capable device made it morph into a luminescent cube that descended into a prize-awarding piece of digital machinery. I created AR-ready 3D assets and animation clips for use in an 8th Wall-developed web app.

title: PivotMIA
subtitle: Liberty & Co., 2022
description: This conference, hosted by podcast hosts Kara Swisher and Scott Galloway, featured the hottest names in business, fintech, media, and more. Interviews, panel discussions and presentations took place on stages at the 1 Hotel in Miami Beach, over lunch on the beach and at a theatrical dinner experience at Faena.
